name: Lunacy (itch) (Lolscrubs) (Lolscrubs)
description:
This game is a reupload. I already published it 3 days ago but had to take it down a few hours later for maintenance reasons.
If you would like to support my work please consider paying, commenting or subscribing to my, it really helps me out.


Lunacy is a horror game inspired by the backrooms, the SCP Foundation and Five Nights at Freddy's consisting of 3 chapters, each with its own theme, goal and entity. There are 2 game modes, normal mode and nightmare mode. In the latter, the levels are darkened and the player is also hunted by another mysterious entity, Mannequin.

Escape + X - Back to menu
WASD - Move
MOUSE - Look
LMB - Zoom
Space - Jump

140+ MB free space
Dual core CPU or better
2GB+ RAM
1024MB+ GPU

More Games made by me https://lolscrubs.itch.io/
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwrSfc2UKrp1QKaEkBt3mFw
